entities.name: godric's hollow
entities.description: The location where Harry and Hermione are discussing Grindelwald's mark. It is mentioned as the place where Viktor Krum told Harry about the symbol.

entities.name: victor krum
entities.description: A person who told Harry about Grindelwald's mark at a wedding. He is described as someone who 'reckoned' that the symbol was carved on a wall at Durmstrang.

entities.name: grindelwald
entities.description: A person mentioned in the story as having a mark. Hermione has never heard of this mark before and is astonished by it.

entities.name: durmstrang
entities.description: A location where Viktor Krum said that Grindelwald's symbol was carved on a wall.

entities.name: scrimgeour
entities.description: The former Minister who should have recognized the symbol as a sign of Dark Magic. Harry and Hermione are surprised that he did not recognize it.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: One of the main characters in the story who is discussing Grindelwald's mark with Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of the main characters in the story who is discussing Grindelwald's mark with Harry.

relationships.description: Viktor Krum told Harry about Grindelwald's mark at a wedding.
Harry and Hermione are discussing Grindelwald's mark in Godric's Hollow.
Scrimgeour should have recognized the symbol as a sign of Dark Magic, but he did not.
Hermione has never heard of Grindelwald's mark before.
